dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener, Mark from Shanghai, just wrote in about Xiaomi's big move into electric vehicles.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, that nine billion dollar investment over the next decade is huge. Lei Jun is personally overseeing it, calling it his last major startup project.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shares of Leis smartphone maker Xiaomi finished the day with a modest gain of 0.6%, after the company said Tuesday evening that it plans to invest about $10 billion into manufacturing electric cars over the next decade.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a massive bet, especially since their core smartphone business, which brought in over sixty percent of their revenue last year, is in a shrinking market.

dialogue_turns.text: Right, global smartphone sales were down six percent last year. So this pivot makes sense, but it's such a capital-intensive industry.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Market research firm Canalys says smartphone shipments worldwide stood at 1.26 billion units in 2020, down 7% from a year earlier partly due to the impact of the pandemic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he's not unaware of the risks. He said they know it'll take billions and three to five years before they see any return. That's a long runway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's not unaware of the risks. He said they know it'll take billions and three to five years before they see any return. That's a long runway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are also aware the project will require billions in investment, and likely take at least 3-5 years before we see any return.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, the EV market has already seen a boom and bust cycle. Hundreds of startups a few years ago, and only a handful survived after subsidies dried up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, the E V market has already seen a boom and bust cycle. Hundreds of startups a few years ago, and only a handful survived after subsidies dried up.

But as government subsidies were phased out and funding dried up, only a handful managed to survive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Analyst Yale Zhang made a good point though—internet companies like Xiaomi might think they have an edge because cars are becoming like computers on wheels.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Analyst Yale Zhang made a good point though-internet companies like Xiaomi might think they have an edge because cars are becoming like computers on wheels.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Internet companies may think they have an advantage because cars are getting increasingly intelligent, and are being compared to computers on four wheels, says Yale Zhang, an analyst at Shanghai-based consultancy Automotive Foresight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But manufacturing a car is a completely different beast from making smartphones. The supply chain, the safety regulations… it's a whole other world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But manufacturing a car is a completely different beast from making smartphones. The supply chain, the safety regulations... it's a whole other world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they've already denied that rumor about using Great Wall Motors' factory, so it's still a mystery how they'll actually produce these cars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they've already denied that rumor about using Great Wall Motors' factory, so it's still a mystery how they'll actually produce these cars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company had previously dismissed via Chinas Twitter-equivalent Sina Weibo reports that it would make cars using Chinese automaker Great Wall Motors factory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Lei does have some experience in the EV space though, right? Through his venture firm Shunwei Capital—they invested in Nio and Xpeng.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lei does have some experience in the E V space though, right? Through his venture firm Shunwei Capital-they invested in Nio and Xpeng.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shunwei Capital, a venture capital firm he cofounded in 2011, counts Chinese electric car companies Nio and Xpeng among its portfolio, according to its website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and an autonomous driving startup called Momenta. So he's got connections, but still… building the car itself is the real challenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and an autonomous driving startup called Momenta. So he's got connections, but still... building the car itself is the real challenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It also invested in Momenta, an autonomous driving startup that had a valuation of $1 billion after a 2018 funding round.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's the whole geopolitical angle—the US investment ban earlier this year that sent their stock plunging. That can't help.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's the whole geopolitical angle-the U S investment ban earlier this year that sent their stock plunging. That can't help.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A federal judge in March ordered a temporary halt to a U.S government ban that blocked Americans from investing in the company, which had sent Xiaomi shares plunging 10% when it was announced in January.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, but the Chinese EV market itself is expected to grow fifty-one percent this year. The demand is clearly there if they can execute.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but the Chinese E V market itself is expected to grow fifty-one percent this year. The demand is clearly there if they can execute.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year, Chinas sales of electric vehicles is expected to climb to 1.9 million units, a jump of 51% from a year earlier, according to Canalys.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: If they can execute. I'm really curious to see what a "Xiaomi car" would even look like. Sleek design, autonomous features, streaming capabilities…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: If they can execute. I'm really curious to see what a Xiaomi car would even look like. Sleek design, autonomous features, streaming capabilities...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He wants one on every road globally. That is… incredibly ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He wants one on every road globally. That is... incredibly ambitious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I look forward to the future where there is a Xiaomi car running on every road globally.

dialogue_turns.text: To say the least. Well, we'll be watching this space closely. Thanks for that message, Mark
